item.title: DOGE Staffers at HUD Are From an AI Real Estate Firm and a Mobile Home Operator
item.description: Elon Musk’s men at HUD come from the real estate sector. They have access to vast stores of personal and financial dataâ€”and control over who can access which HUD systems.
